hero.title: Work-Friendly Spaces
hero.description: In the age of remote work, finding the perfect place to stay productive can feel like a daily challenge. The future of work is decentralized, and so too must be the platforms that help us navigate it.

mainContent.quote: Where can I work right now that matches my mindset and goals for the day?

definition.title: What Are Work-Friendly Spaces?
definition.mainContent: Work-friendly spaces are public or semi-public environments where people can work comfortably and efficiently — not just traditional coworking spaces, but cafés, libraries, rooftops, hotels, cultural centers, and even parks. What sets them apart is the experience they offer: designed with productivity and purpose in mind.

wifi.title: Reliable Wi-Fi
wifi.description: Fast and stable internet connection crucial for calls, uploads, and maintaining workflow.

comfort.title: Comfort & Lighting
comfort.description: Comfortable seating arrangements and natural light — a necessity for long work sessions.

ambiance.title: Focused Ambiance
ambiance.description: Peaceful environments or focused atmosphere that inspires productivity and meaningful connections.

definition.pullQuote: These spaces are designed (or discovered) with productivity and purpose in mind — and often, they're hiding in plain sight.

decentralization.title: The Shift Toward Decentralized Work Environments
decentralization.description: The 9-to-5 office isn't just outdated — it's dissolving. In its place is a global network of flexible, autonomous workers who operate on their own schedules, from wherever they feel most productive. In a decentralized work world, the environment adapts to the worker — not the other way around.

traditional.title: Why Remote Workers Are Moving Away from Traditional Coworking

cost.title: Cost Barriers
cost.description: Subscriptions and day passes often exceed local café budgets, making them inaccessible for many remote workers.

ambiance.title: Lack of Ambiance
ambiance.description: Many locations lack the energy or atmosphere people seek, feeling too rigid or impersonal for creative work.

location.title: Limited Distribution
location.description: Often concentrated in a few neighborhoods, leaving other areas overlooked and underserved.

ideal.title: Features of the Ideal Work-Friendly Space
ideal.introduction: Not every café or coworking spot is built equally. The best work-friendly spaces share some core traits that aren't luxuries — they're baseline expectations in the new era of remote work:

features.internet: Fast and stable internet — crucial for calls, uploads, and flow
features.comfort: Comfortable chairs and natural light — a necessity for long sessions
features.outlets: Accessible outlets — no more fighting for power
features.noise: Appropriate noise levels — from deep focus to social vibes

coffiVision.title: Coworking 2.0: Coffi's Vision for the Future
coffiVision.mainContent: Coffi is not just another directory of cafés or coworking spaces. It's a dynamic, community-powered platform built for people who need the right space at the right time. We call it Coworking 2.0 — a smarter, decentralized way of discovering and experiencing places based on your purpose, mood, and live context.
coffiVision.secondaryContent: The result? A more intentional, empowered, and human way of working from anywhere.

platformFeatures.title: How Coffi Works
platformFeatures.subtitle: A dynamic, community-powered platform for the modern remote worker
platformFeatures.secondaryContent: The platform empowers users to make informed decisions about where to work, study, or connect based on real-time community insights and personal preferences.

discover.title: Discover Spaces
discover.description: Find spaces near you to work, study, or connect with like-minded people.

filter.title: Smart Filtering
filter.description: Filter places by Wi-Fi speed, ambiance, noise, crowd level, and more specific criteria.

realTime.title: Real-Time Updates
realTime.description: Get live updates from the community on current vibe, availability, and conditions.

platformFeatures.quote: Be where you thrive. That's the new standard of work.

whyDecentralization.title: Why Decentralization Matters for the Future of Work

economic.title: Local Economic Impact
economic.description: Small cafés and alternative spaces benefit from increased foot traffic and community support.

environmental.title: Environmental Benefits
environmental.description: Reduced commuting and lower carbon footprint through distributed work patterns.

satisfaction.title: Worker Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: Higher worker satisfaction and autonomy through flexible, personalized work environments.

talent.title: Global Talent Access
talent.description: Access to a global talent pool unconstrained by geographic limitations.

futureWork.title: The Future of Remote Work
futureWork.description: The future of work is already here. It's not tied to an office or even a coworking chain — it's wherever you thrive. Whether you're looking to focus deeply, collaborate socially, or simply find the right energy to move forward with your goals, there's a space out there for you.
futureWork.callout: And Coffi is here to help you find it.

concluding.description: The future of work is decentralized, flexible, and human-centered. Discover work-friendly spaces that match your needs, contribute to a growing community, and be part of the transformation happening right now.
